    Mattia Di Gangi

    PhD student working on Neural Machine Translation. I like technology, AI in particular, and self-development.

    University of Trento and Fondazione Bruno Kessler (FBK)
    Research topic: Neural Machine Translation
    Advisor: Marcello Federico
